Body:
"""Assert that all missing values are imputed in categorical columns."""
for v in ['', '?', 'NA', 'nan', 'inf']:
    X = [[v, '1', '1'], ['2', '5', v], ['2', '1', '3'], ['3', '1', '1']]
    y = [1, 1, 0, 0]
    imputer = Imputer(strat_cat='most_frequent')
    X, y = imputer.fit_transform(X, y)
    assert X.isna().sum().sum() == 0
